title: Coach's Clipboard
description: React web app for coaches and PE teachers that's meant to replace the clipboard. Utilizes Redux, React Router, and Firebase for the database

title: Sonic Adventure
description: Kids scavenger hunt that gives clues and asks for correct answers before giving the next clue. Utilizes react with JSON files for the information.

title: Armored Coatings
description: Clean and simple website using html, custom css, bootstrap, and javascript. Zipcode API will be implemented in estimate modal for more accurate estimates.
